title: Bug 52394intertype declarations cause JRockit Crash
description: Bug 52394intertype declarations cause JRockit Crash (Obviously I have also submitted this bug to BEA, butthe AJ team may be able to shed some light on what is going on and where (ifanywhere) BEA's JVM is behaving wrong. JRockit can be downloaded at:http://commerce.bea.com/showallversions.jsp?family=WLJR. I reproduced this erroron Windows XP, but it also happend on RedHat.Is it worth adding JRockit to AspectJ's compatibility test suite?
OB: BEA's JRockit JVM (version:8.1sp21.4.105Load10vikingwin32sthqa29200311051554) crashes on simpleintertype declarations.
